Membership

Join Our Trusted Community

Simple and Secure Enrollment

Becoming a member of our co-operative society means more than just accessing financial services it means being part of a trusted community that puts people before profit. As a member, you have a voice in key decisions, access to exclusive services, and the assurance that your financial growth is our shared mission.

Whether you're saving for the future, applying for a loan, or looking for a reliable partner in your financial journey, membership opens the door to personalized support and fair, transparent solutions. Join today and experience the power of financial inclusion with community-driven values.

Set your goal

Your Cash Management Accounts Unlock More than Vertex Co-operative society

Deposits

Secure your savings and earn steady returns with flexible deposit plans tailored for members.

Loan

Get fast, affordable loans with transparent terms to meet your personal or business needs.

Credits

Enjoy easy access to funds with our low-interest credit card designed for co-operative trust and convenience.

No Monthly Fees. Just Transparent, Member-Friendly Pricing.

Refundable Deposit (Shared Money + Compulsory Deposit) 200 ( 100 + 100)
Admission Fee 100
Building Fund 100
Welfare Fund 100
Other Deposits 100
Non-Refundable Fee (Admission Fee + Building Fund + Welfare Fund + Other Deposits) 400 Mid-Market Rate
Total Cost 600
